title: Il Lombardia: Tadej Pogačar Soloes to Victory to Cap Near-Perfect Season
content:
The UAE superstar jumped on the day's last climb to gap the likes of Remco Evenepoel and Enric Mas to win for fourth-straight time.

Read the full article at Il Lombardia: Tadej Pogačar Soloes to Victory to Cap Near-Perfect Season on Velo.
author: ahood
